headline: Vici Properties Stock Soared in Q1 While the S&P 500 Struggled. Here's Why.
summary: Vici Properties (NYSE: VICI) had a great first quarter.  The real estate investment trust (REIT) soared 11.7% to start the year, according to data provided by S&P Global Market Intelligence.  Here's a look at what drove the REIT's strong first-quarter rally and what's ahead for the company this year.
